Source.Name: giblib
Source.Summary: giblib is a simple library which wraps imlib2 and provides a context API for it
Source.Description: giblib is a simple library which wraps imlib2. It provides a wrapper to imlib2's context API, avoiding all the context_get/set calls, adds fontstyles to the truetype renderer and supplies a generic doubly-linked list and some string functions.

Package.Name: giblib-devel
Package.Description: giblib is a simple library which wraps imlib2. It provides a wrapper to imlib2's context API, avoiding all the context_get/set calls, adds fontstyles to the truetype renderer and supplies a generic doubly-linked list and some string functions.
